events.message: I placed my order over two weeks ago, but the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking hasn't updated and it's quite frustrating.
The reported issue has been categorized under the Delivery Delay cluster based on the customer's description of a late shipment.
Customer’s delivery delay case has been assigned to an agent specializing in shipping and tracking issues for resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’ve received your message regarding the delayed package. I’m here to help you track the delivery.
Could you please provide the order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the shipping status for you?
Sure, the order number is ORD1234567. The tracking number is TRK987654321, but it hasn’t updated since last week.
Thank you for the information. I have contacted the shipping carrier and initiated an urgent inquiry to locate your package. We expect an update within 24 hours.
Thanks for the quick response and for looking into it. I appreciate your help and hope to get the package soon.
Good news! The carrier located your package and it is now out for delivery. You should receive it by the end of today.
Just checking in to confirm that your package was delivered successfully. Please let us know if you have any further issues.
Yes, I received the package yesterday. Everything is perfect now. Thanks for your assistance!
We are happy to hear your package arrived safely. Closing this case now, but feel free to contact us if you need any help in the future.
